name: Lumenator
description: Add e1.31 streaming support to your ESP8266 based light bulbs

scripts.build: rm -rf data/build/* && parcel build src/index.html src/setup.html src/style.scss src/lumenator.tsx --dist-dir data/build --no-source-maps --no-content-hash --no-cache && npm run gzip && npm run dump
scripts.minifyConfig: cd ./src && python -c 'import json, sys;json.dump(json.load(sys.stdin), sys.stdout, separators=(",",":"))'  < default-config.json > ../data/build/default-config.min.json
scripts.gzip: cd ./data/build && gzip -kf index.html && gzip -kf setup.html && gzip -kf lumenator.js && gzip -kf style.css
scripts.dump: cd ./data/build && xxd -i -u index.html.gz >> index.html.h && xxd -i -u setup.html.gz >> setup.html.h && xxd -i -u lumenator.js.gz >> lumenator.js.h && xxd -i -u style.css.gz >> style.css.h
